content: AMETAVERSE Is A Real-Time Multiplayer Game Platform That Can Be Imagined As a Web3 Arcade._______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________        WEBSITE | TWITTER  | DISCORD  | TELEGRAM  |_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________WHAT DOES AMETAVERSE WANT TO BUILD?Ametaverse aims to establish a new direction for e-sports through the following game mechanics. comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: The market is saturated with metaverse gaming platforms I invested in three of these during their heydays just last year and up until now my investments are down 80% you should do better marketing and build a loyal community the early players in the industry are having a hard time to climb the market.The airdrop and bounty campaign will surely bring more players but you have to show something different from the early gaming platforms to get the support of the gaming community.

comments.author: ADAM Alams
comments.body: Your project seems really good. How can I play the games?

comments.author: nioctib_100
comments.created_time: March 10, 2023, 09:19:42 PMLast edit: March 11, 2023, 02:31:23 AM by nioctib_100
comments.body: I played the racing game and thoroughly enjoyed it. It was pretty impressive for a browser-based game. I'm hesitant about the name though, I think you're unfortunately setting the company up for a lawsuit from Facebook/Meta. They've trademarked "Metaverse" specifically in the cryptocurrency industry already, and so "Ametaverse" will never fly by them. How can the company grow enough when that cloud will always loom overhead if the name stays the same?

How can I play the games?We have released 2 games, try them out!Greys Stellar: https://www.ametaverse.io/WebGL/GreysStellar/greys-stellar.htmlCrypto Racing: https://www.ametaverse.io/WebGL/CryptoRacing/crypto-racing.html*The games are only supported on desktop browsers, and we recommend using Chrome for optimal performance.

comments.author: PSULLWALERS
comments.body: What strategies will you use to achieve widespread adoption of your platform? How will you incentivize users to adopt your platform?

comments.author: AMETAVERSE
comments.body: Quote from: PSULLWALERS on March 15, 2023, 08:38:31 PMWhat strategies will you use to achieve widespread adoption of your platform? How will you incentivize users to adopt your platform?As a blockchain game platform, there are several strategies we plan to use to achieve widespread adoption and incentivize users to adopt our platform.First, we plan to partner with established blockchain networks to gain exposure and credibility. This will help us to reach a larger audience and attract users who are already familiar with blockchain technology.Second, we will focus on creating an engaging and immersive gaming experience that will keep users coming back to our platform. By offering unique and innovative games, we can attract gamers who are interested in trying new experiences.Third, we plan to offer incentives to users who adopt our platform, such as rewards for early adopters and referral bonuses for users who invite their friends to join. This will encourage users to spread the word about our platform and attract more users.Fourth, we will continuously improve and update our platform based on user feedback to ensure that we are meeting the needs and preferences of our users. This will help to retain users and attract new ones over time.Overall, our goal is to create a platform that is not only fun and engaging but also provides real value to our users. By offering incentives, partnering with established blockchain networks, and continuously improving our platform, we are confident that we can achieve widespread adoption and become a leading blockchain game platform.
